summary.Title: Breakfast Employees for CABINN Copenhagen

Do you have the drive to deliver exceptional service and are you passionate about making every moment matter for our h

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Employees for our Breakfast Café - CABINN Coepnhagen

Do you have the drive to deliver exceptional service and are you passionate about making every moment matter for our hotel guests in our Café? Then come join us as at hotel CABINN Copenhagen. We are asap looking for outgoing, friendly and 100% service minded employees for our Breakfast Cafë.

Job description

As an employee in our Breakfast Café, you are primarily responsible for setting up and maintaining our breakfast buffet as well as serving our guests. Our employees in the breakfast room are a very important part of our guest’s stay in delivering a hospitality experience that goes above and beyond the guests’ expectations and creating unforgettable memories for them in our hotel.

Your daily tasks include, clearing tables, cleaning of the dining/buffet area and the kitchen, as well as maintaining storage and breakfast supply inventories cost effectively.
At CABINN Copenhagen we also have a conference department which falls under the responsibility of the Café employees.

Working hours
We are looking for part time and we are also looking for temps with zero hours guaranteed. In both positions you can apply for extra available shifts in all our CABINN hotels in Copenhagen once employed.

The available positions at the moment are:

  • 15 hours every second weekend.
  • 22,5 hour per week (iclude every second weekend)
  • Temps with zero hours guaranteed - you can apply for available shifts in all our CABINN hotels in Copenhagen once employed.

We are looking for:
- an efficient, quick, and hard-working individual
- Previous background in food and beverage handling or equivalent training is an advantage

- You speak English fluently and Danish is an advantage
- You work responsibly and enjoy working independently but can also thrive in a team
- You are flexible with your shifts and can take extra shift with short notice
- Can start working asap as we are very busy.

We offer:

  • A dynamic workplace with many possibilities of creating relationships across cultures.
  • An exciting workplace with a high pace every day
  • Fixed shifts in the same 4-week rotation – extra shifts and changes may occur
    Payment according to the current union agreement

Application only through our website, we do not accept applications by email

About CABINN A/S
CABINN is a Danish owned- and developed hotel chain with 11 hotels centrally placed in Copenhagen, Aarhus, Odense, Aalborg, Esbjerg and Vejle. Read more about CABINN and CABINN Scandinavia at www.cabinn.com
